channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Protein lattes and cold foam will roll out in U.S. and Canada stores starting Sept. 29, the company announced this week.

item.description: Bridgewater's billionaire founder sees dangerous 1930s parallels as government intervention increases and debt reaches World War II levels.

item.title: Ban the Fear, Not the Freedom: Massachusetts Bill Misses the Mark on Nicotine
item.description: In a society of free, autonomous adults, banning nicotine because it offends one legislator’s sensibilities is simply unacceptable.

item.title: The Biggest Hindrance To Confirming Trump’s Nominees Is John Thune
